name: XACML-WebPAP
short_description:
XACML-WebPAP provides a graphic tool for users and administrators to define access control policies following the XACML standard. These policies can be later used by a policy-based authorization system where they can be deployed in order to control the access to resources.

The policies generated by the editor follow the XACML 2.0 standard. The interface provided is simple and intuitive for users, avoiding XACML details. It is intended to users with little or no knowledge about XACML. Although the editor does not provide full XACML editing capabilities, it enables to generate and manage the main elements to define policy specifications for access control.
summary: Web editor to define access control policies in XACML.
